pkgmetadata.longdescription: # nidhoggr-coreThis package contains all domain model for [nighoggr] library forconvenient interop with other Python applications (like[nidhoggr-requests]).[nidhoggr]: https://pypi.org/project/nidhoggr/[nidhoggr-requests]: https://pypi.org/project/nidhoggr-requests/# History## 0.5.0 (2020-01-10)* **Breaking** Always return User from UserRepository## 0.4.1 (2020-01-09)* Improved API consistency## 0.4.0 (2020-01-09)* **Breaking** Split StatusResponse on two classes## 0.3.0 (2020-01-06)* **Breaking** Return StatusResponse from each method of repositories## 0.1.0 (2019-12-31)* First release on PyPI.
